title: Modulefile (tcl, lmod) generation fails, '... Cannot create a consistent method resolution...'
body:
Trying to generate Lmod modulefiles fails, see below.

### Expected Result

Lmod module files for installed applications.

### Actual Result

```
$ spack find
==> 35 installed packages.
-- linux-ubuntu14.04-x86_64 / gcc@4.8 ---------------------------
autoconf@2.69    expat@2.2.2       libssh2@1.8.0            m4@1.4.18       readline@7.0
automake@1.15.1  gdbm@1.14.1       libtool@2.4.6            ncurses@6.0     sqlite@3.22.0
bzip2@1.0.6      gettext@0.19.8.1  libxml2@2.9.4            openssl@1.0.2n  tar@1.29
cask@0.8.1       git@2.15.1        lmod@7.7.13              pcre@8.41       tcl@8.6.6
cmake@3.10.2     libbsd@0.8.6      lua@5.3.4                perl@5.24.1     tree@1.7.0
curl@7.56.0      libiconv@1.15     lua-luafilesystem@1_6_3  pkgconf@1.4.0   xz@5.2.3
emacs@25.3       libsigsegv@2.11   lua-luaposix@33.4.0      python@2.7.14   zlib@1.2.11
$ spack module refresh --module-type lmod --delete-tree -y
==> Regenerating lmod module files
==> Warning: Could not write module file [/home/hartzell/spack/share/spack/lmod/linux-ubuntu14.04-x86_64/gcc/4.8/autoconf/2.69.lua]
==> Warning: 	--> Cannot create a consistent method resolution
order (MRO) for bases SpecBuildInterface, Spec <--
==> Warning: Could not write module file [/home/hartzell/spack/share/spack/lmod/linux-ubuntu14.04-x86_64/gcc/4.8/automake/1.15.1.lua]
==> Warning: 	--> Cannot create a consistent method resolution
order (MRO) for bases SpecBuildInterface, Spec <--
==> Warning: Could not write module file [/home/hartzell/spack/share/spack/lmod/linux-ubuntu14.04-x86_64/gcc/4.8/git/2.15.1.lua]
==> Warning: 	--> Cannot create a consistent method resolution
order (MRO) for bases SpecBuildInterface, Spec <--
$
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

See above.

### Information on your system

This includes:

 1. which platform you are using

```
$ cat /etc/lsb-release
DISTRIB_ID=Ubuntu
DISTRIB_RELEASE=14.04
DISTRIB_CODENAME=trusty
DISTRIB_DESCRIPTION="Ubuntu 14.04.1 LTS"
```

 2. any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.)

I'm on the `develop` branch at commit: b91b00f6f954e6d4200ff38e845b2dc2cb256415.

I'm using a config based on an older environment, there's some risk that I'm not up to date....

`etc/spack/modules.yaml`:

```yaml
modules:
  enable::
    - lmod
  lmod:
    core_compilers:
      - 'gcc@4.8.2'
    hash_length: 0
    whitelist:
      - gcc
    blacklist:
      - '%gcc@4.8.2'
    verbose_autoload: false
    all:
      filter:
        environment_blacklist: ['CPATH', 'LIBRARY_PATH', 'LD_LIBRARY_PATH']
      environment:
        set:
          '${PACKAGE}_ROOT': '${PREFIX}'
    ^python:
      autoload:  'direct'
      filter:
        environment_whitelist: ['LD_LIBRARY_PATH']
```
